message: Let's split it 7:3, fair and square!
Meet me in the middle, let's call it a draw!
I'm not settling for 50. I'll do better than that!
You can't do better than 60? Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think it's still a good deal!
I'm not sure... 45 is a bit too low. Can you do any better?
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a bigger share!
I'm not getting any younger either, I want a bigger share now!
35? You're joking, right? I'm not giving up that much!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me, Alice! I'm making the final offer!
Fine, Bob. You win this time. I'll take 20 dollars.
